message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: Display Name is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LOCALE_UNIQUE
message.locale: This Language has already been specified for the Citizen Portal.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DISPLAY_NAME_UNIQUE
message.locale: This Display Name has already been defined for a Language used by the Citizen Portal.

message.name: ERR_XRV_IMAGE_UNIQUE
message.locale: This Image has already been specified.
